questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Indoor seating area

B) A sports event
C) An indoor waiting area
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) People
B) Furniture
C) Artwork
D) Animals

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bench
C) Three chairs and a Leaf Plant
D) A table

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A glass block wall
C) A bookshelf
D) A window

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Three chairs and A plant
B) A car
C) A playground
D) A painting

What is the relationship between the seating and the plant in the photo?
A) They are next to each other
B) They are on opposite sides of the room
C) The plant is on top of the seating
D) The seating is in front of the plant

How many seats are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

A) Carpet
B) Wooden
C) Tiled
D) Concrete

C) Green
D) Black

A) Red
B) Blue
C) White

A) Busy and chaotic

A) None
B) One
